titles.title: To extend the duty suspension on 2,2-Dimethyl-3-(3-methylphenyl)proponal.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/9/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension, through December 31, 2008, of the duty on 2,2-Dimethyl-3-(3-methylphenyl)proponal.
